```{r include = FALSE}
library(dplyr)

shots_data = read.csv("../data/shots-data.csv")

two_point_shooting_percent = 
  shots_data %>% 
  filter(shot_type == "2PT Field Goal") %>% 
  group_by(name) %>% 
  summarise(
    total = n(), 
    made = sum(shot_made_flag == "shot_yes"), 
    perc_made = sum(shot_made_flag == "shot_yes") / n()) %>% 
  arrange(desc(perc_made))

three_point_shooting_percent = 
  shots_data %>% 
  filter(shot_type == "3PT Field Goal") %>% 
  group_by(name) %>% 
  summarise(
    total = n(), 
    made = sum(shot_made_flag == "shot_yes"), 
    perc_made = sum(shot_made_flag == "shot_yes") / n()) %>% 
  arrange(desc(perc_made))

shooting_percent = 
  shots_data %>% 
  group_by(name) %>% 
  summarise(
    total = n(), 
    made = sum(shot_made_flag == "shot_yes"), 
    perc_made = sum(shot_made_flag == "shot_yes") / n()) %>% 
  arrange(desc(perc_made))
```
